医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
动物角色对儿童心理发展可以发挥重要作用儿童读物中充满了动物角色，它们的滑稽动作俘获了小读者的心，激发了他们的想象力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Animal-characters-can-play-an-important-role-in-childrens-psychological-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Animal-characters-can-play-an-important-role-in-childrens-psychological-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11c0ccea-1a03-4cf7-9c77-5d1d37b9c2a4 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 20:20:49 -0500 Animal characters can play an important role in children's psychological development
新模拟器帮助护理学生为儿科重症监护做好准备一个新的模拟器为护理学生提供了机械通气和儿童气管抽吸等重要程序的实践练习。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-simulator-prepares-nursing-students-for-pediatric-ritic-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-simulator-prepares-nursing-students-for-pediatric-ritic-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fb10c33-70a1-4e46-a036-12740e68f592 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:58:02 -0500 New simulator prepares nursing students for pediatric critical care
研究：70%的澳大利亚抑郁症患者缺乏足够的治疗研究人员发现，70% 被诊断患有重度抑郁症的澳大利亚人甚至没有接受最基本的必要治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Study-7025-of-Australians-with-depression-lack-adequate-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Study-7025-of-Australians-with-depression-lack-adequate-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4feaf8b3-25e0-4f24-a504-7729bb143a60 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:54:36 -0500 Study: 70% of Australians with depression lack adequate treatment
研究显示美国各地的预期寿命存在明显差异美国的预期寿命相差 20 多年，具体取决于个人的种族和民族以及居住地。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Study-reveals-stark-life-expectancy-disparities-across-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Study-reveals-stark-life-expectancy-disparities-across-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e20413d4-55ac-465e-93a1-2ce9298f815f Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:50:33 -0500 Study reveals stark life expectancy disparities across the United States
发现与早期流产相关的基因变异罗格斯大学新不伦瑞克分校的研究人员领导的科学家们发现了一种与女性早期流产直接相关的基因变异，这可能是了解人类不孕症遗传原因的重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Gene-variant-linked-to-early-miscarriages-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Gene-variant-linked-to-early-miscarriages-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=185f3f7d-f574-44ee-bc15-335fff3dfa9b Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:46:57 -0500 Gene variant linked to early miscarriages identified
辅助脑膜中动脉栓塞可减少慢性硬膜下血肿的治疗失败神经介入外科协会 (SNIS) 成员的新研究发现，辅助脑膜中动脉栓塞术 (MMAE) 治疗慢性硬膜下血肿 (CSDH) 比单独标准治疗的治疗失败风险更低，且不会导致发病率增加短期内导致中风或死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Adjunctive-middle-meningeal-artery-embolization-reduces-treatment-failure-for-chronic-subdural-hematoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Adjunctive-middle-meningeal-artery-embolization-reduces-treatment-failure-for-chronic-subdural-hematoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4534d18-ab54-4ea6-a50e-e92245b8f762 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:38:31 -0500 Adjunctive middle meningeal artery embolization reduces treatment failure for chronic subdural hematoma
环境因素导致南加州 PFAS 暴露量增加越来越多的证据表明，全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 会导致健康问题，这是一组用于消费品的化学制品，会在体内积聚并需要很长时间才能分解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Environmental-factors-contribute-to-higher-PFAS-exposure-in-Southern-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Environmental-factors-contribute-to-higher-PFAS-exposure-in-Southern-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=908931ec-5928-4f8a-bfd7-eef565549e26 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:27:13 -0500 Environmental factors contribute to higher PFAS exposure in Southern California
创建用于研究记忆和感知的先进 3D 大脑模型海马体是最迷人的大脑区域之一。它与记忆的形成相关，还可以帮助我们在世界中导航而不会迷失方向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Advanced-3D-brain-models-created-to-study-memory-and-perception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/Advanced-3D-brain-models-created-to-study-memory-and-perception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d531d2e-65f4-44c8-aa6a-0bcdea1d6765 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:22:00 -0500 Advanced 3D brain models created to study memory and perception
新数据凸显欧洲碳青霉烯类耐药感染的传播在医院或其他医疗机构寻求治疗的患者在住院期间特别容易受到感染，尤其是当感染因对常用药物产生耐药性而难以治疗时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-data-highlights-spread-of-carbapenem-pressive-infections-in-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/New-data-highlights-spread-of-carbapenem-pressive-infections-in-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9b5d5bb-953a-4499-86ff-cf16c90b2730 Fri, 22 Nov 2024 19:14:18 -0500 New data highlights spread of carbapenem-resistant infections in Europe
AI设计的药物ISM5939获得癌症临床试验IND许可Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能（AI）驱动的药物发现公司，宣布其 ISM5939 已获得 FDA 的 IND 批准，ISM5939 是一种潜在的同类最佳口服小分子抑制剂，针对 ENPP1实体瘤的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/AI-Designed-drug-ISM5939-granted-IND-clearance-for-cancer-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241122/AI-Designed-drug-ISM5939-granted-IND-clearance-for-cancer-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8e0ef4e-0a44-4925-a973-e76bc6f77a3f Fri, 22 Nov 2024 18:34:32 -0500 AI-designed drug ISM5939 granted IND clearance for cancer clinical trials
